chargeHist.descr: Sex with Child Age 16 or Older

result.execSummary:
The defendant Inteus N Garza was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 3rd Degree Sexual Assault, a class G felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.225(3).
  • Sex with Child Age 16 or Older, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 948.09.

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes:
If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  

A copy of the police report has been electronically sent to the probation office.

Complete Sex Offender Treatment.

Register with the Sex Offender Registry while on Probation and for 15 years after being discharged from Probation.

Counseling as recommended.

DNA sample.

No objection for transfer to Washington State or any County residing in (Lincoln County currently).

Court finds 578 days credit if revoked.
GFE to maintain FTE, full time schooling and when not fully engaged must complete 10 hours community service.

No contact with K.J.R. 

No contact with females under the age of 18 unless supervised by someone 25 or older with exception of family.

Assessment, treatment, counseling as recommended. 

Court finds 201 days credit.  

Sex offender treatment. 

If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  

A copy of the police report has been electronically sent to the probation office.

supervisions.notes: Outstanding financial obligations converted to Civil Judgment.

Case Called: 3:53 pm
Includes 14CF1043 and 14CM1795.
Clerk: Kassidi.
Defendant Inteus N Garza in court with attorney John Charles Bachman.  Defendant Inteus N Garza in custody.  Anita M. Lawrence appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
VRCW. Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights & Counsel filed. State moves to:
14CF1043:
Ct. 3 (BJ)>>DRI.

14CM1795:
Ct. 1 (DC)>>DRI.
COURT GRANTS ABOVE.
 
PLEA: 
14CF1043:
Ct. 1 (3rd Degree Sexual Assault)>>GUILTY.
Ct. 2 (Sex with Child Age 16 or Older)>>GUILTY.
Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  

COURT ORDERS: 
14CF1043:
Ct. 1 (3rd Degree Sexual Assault)>> COURT w/holds finding and entry of guilt - COURT adopts written deferred entry of judgment agreement as signed by all parties and submitted to COURT.
COURT defers matter for a period of 2 years for defendant to comply with all terms and conditions of written DEJ agreement.
If defendant is in full compliance with all terms and conditions of written DEJ agreement within that time frame and obtains no new criminal charges, State to DISMISS Ct. 1.
COURT FINDS 201 days credit.
DEOJ RH>> 6/19/2017 @ 9:00 am
Bond continues.

Ct. 2 (Sex with Child Age 16 or Older)>> Sentence W/H- 2 years probation. CONDITIONS: Assessment/treatment/counseling as recommended, Sex Offender Treatment, No Contact with K.J.R., No Contact with females under the age of 18 unless supervised by someone 25 or older with exception of family, Good faith effort to maintain Full time work/Full time School and when not fully engaged must complete 10 hours Community Service, Court Costs. COURT finds 201 days credit.

BOND TO BE AMENDED TO A $10,000 SIGNATURE BOND. CONDITIONS AMENDED: DEFENDANT CAN BE IN CONTACT WITH FAMILY MEMBERS.
